title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       July 2016 16 Special Exhibit Opening - two very exciting exhibits are being added to the visitor center, the public is invited out from 6pm - 8pm for the exhibit unveiling.   August 2016   6 Annual Symposium - this annual program is a partnership with Auburn University and the Friends of Horseshoe Bend. Our 2016 Symposium will be related to the mission of the National Park Service and the preservation of Horseshoe Bend National Military Park.    20 Muster on the Tallapoosa - Honoring the centennial of the National Park Service, our annual muster on the Tallapoosa will feature a unique telling of the history of the Horseshoe Bend and the communities' role in sharing the story.    All events are free and open to the public.
